headline.print_headline: Prosecutor: Hawaii Prison Gang 'Kings of Castle'
headline.main: Prosecutor: Hawaii Prison Gang 'Kings of Castle'

lead_paragraph: A Hawaii prison gang formed out of a need for inmate protection evolved into a violent organization whose members are "kings of their castle," a federal prosecutor told a jury Wednesday at the start of a racketeering trial for a former prison guard and an inmate.
